attributes.action: VAT on all things we buy and reduce fuel tax / Duty to 20% or current rate at the time
attributes.additional_details:
Remove the high tax from all fuel make it the same tax rate as vat and i mean only vat tax on it nothing else. one tax not two just VAT,

Place tax on food @ the full rate,
Place tax on gas and Electric @ the full rate
Place tax on all fuels sold to anyone and airplane fuel and the like,
Give ID cards to OAP on low income to allow a Reduced amount of tax for all tax types. Like a Store card,

The motorist should not have to pay for all of the UK.
Everyone should pay,

One tax rate for everything,
